mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO repertory_apply_list (apply_id, goods_id, goods_name, standard_id, standard_name, standard_count) VALUES
(#{applyId},#{item.goodsId},#{item.goodsName}, #{item.standardId},#{item.standardName},#{item.standardCount})
mapper.select: SELECT ral.goods_id,ral.goods_name,ral.standard_id, ral.standard_name,ral.standard_count FROM repertory_apply_list ral WHERE ral.apply_id = #{applyId}
